name: zip
signature: { <A2, E2>(that: Fiber<A2, E2>): <A, E>(self: Fiber<A, E>) => Fiber<[A, A2], E2 | E>; <A, E, A2, E2>(self: Fiber<A, E>, that: Fiber<A2, E2>): Fiber<[A, A2], E | E2>; }
description:
Zips this fiber and the specified fiber together, producing a tuple of
their output.
documentation:
Zips this fiber and the specified fiber together, producing a tuple of
their output.
